QuestData.Title: The Sky Race
QuestData.Description: The time for the great race is upon us!$B$BTraverse the course among the spires and pass through the checkered flags on each of the 10 balloon checkpoints.$B$BMake sure to pass underneath the finish line when you are done.$B$BThe competition will be fierce, but I wish you luck. Speak to me when you are ready to begin.
QuestData.LogDescription: Complete the Sky Race by flying through 10 checkpoints, then passing underneath the Finish Line at The Arboretum.
